message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more upfront since the value decreases for me over time.
I'll take a bit more since the value doesn't decrease for me.
How about we meet in the middle, Bob? This deal gets worse for me each round.
I'll give you a bit less since the value decreases for you, but I still get the bigger share.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm taking a significant hit with the inflation. Let's be reasonable and close to our previous middle ground.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But the inflation only hurts you, so I'll take a bit more.
